Why We Love Pendant Lighting

Modern pendants offer unmatched diversity ranging from understated single pendant versions to statement-making multi-light pendants. Regardless of your décor style, you can find a contemporary pendant that suits your space—from whimsical and fun styles to those with clean lines.

What are the Different Types of Pendant Lighting?

Small and mini-pendant lights look great in indoor spaces like foyers, reading nooks and bathrooms. Large hanging lamps or multi-light fixtures are best suited to indoor spaces like dining rooms, and kitchen pendant lights provide bright task lighting. Single pendants can also be grouped and suspended at various heights for a bold statement.

Iconic Pendant Light Designs

Discover top interior lighting brands, including Visual Comfort and the iconic Nelson Bubble Lamps. From ultramodern pendants by SONNEMAN Lighting and Tech Lighting to refined and minimalist suspensions from FLOS Lighting.

How to Choose the Best Pendants:

What's the purpose of my new pendant light? Determine what you want your light to do. For instance, pendants hanging over your kitchen island will provide task-oriented illumination while the lighting at the front door is meant to welcome guests and provide safety.

How do I choose the right-size pendant light? You'll need to consider the ceiling height (including vaulted and sloped ceilings) to help you make the best choice. Be mindful of the width, depth, height and even weight of a fixture you are interested in.

How much light will a pendant provide? LED pendants will emit a different amount of light compared to halogen or incandescent light sources. Be sure to take a look at our guide on interpreting lumens, too.

How do I install pendant ceiling lights? If you plan to install hanging lights on a sloped surface or a vaulted ceiling, be sure you invest in all necessary connectors, suspension cables, dimmers and installation hardware, and consider how the fixture will be cleaned or maintained over time. We recommend consulting with your electrician when installing a new pendant.

Other Considerations

Improve the energy efficiency of your home with eco-friendly LED pendant lighting. Appropriately layer the amount of lighting in a given room with the addition of wall sconces and modern lamps. Lastly, if you're searching for outdoor hanging lights, make a note of whether the fixture is suitable for wet or damp spaces.
